name: pos-lightweight
description: Lightweight POS System with JSON Server Backend

scripts.start:api: npm run build:db && json-server --watch api-data/db.json --routes api-data/routes.json --port 5000 --host localhost
scripts.dev:api: npm run build:db && json-server --watch api-data/db.json --routes api-data/routes.json --port 5000
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:db" "npm run dev:api" "npm run start:frontend"
